above named only. It may contain privileged or confidential information. If
you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately and
confirm that all copies have been destroyed and it has been deleted from your
computer system. This e-mail is protected by copyright. Unless you are the
intended recipient you should not use, disclose or copy the e-mail nor should
you rely upon it in any way whatsoever.

disclosed, or reproduced in any format by any non-Bechtel party without
